attributes.action: Charge all Londoners £ 8.00 per vehicle per day to visit anywhere in the UK if they travel by road. .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If Londoners travelled about the UK and payed a congestion charge to every Village, Hamlet, Town , Borough etc. to 
contribute to that areas transport, it would soon make them get rid of their own unpopular charge. A Londoner going to Scotland could quite easily expect to pay in excess of £ 2000.00 if they did not return on the same day it would be double. Londoners benefit to there transport system from all vehicles that the center of London each day,many of those are from outside the Capital.
